person.persName: Joseph F. Herd (Owsley County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Owsley County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of William Herd and Rebecca Hudson. Married to Nancy E. Herd. Enlisted as a Private in the 7th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) in Boonville, Kentucky, on August 19, 1861. Promoted to 4th Corporal on March 1, 1863. Honorably discharged and transferred to the 47th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) by order of Secretary of War Edwin M. Stanton on October 10, 1863. Promoted to 2nd Lieutenant of the 47th Kentucky in November 1863.
